resources.string: Unable to load posts. Are you connected to the internet?
Unable to load comments. Are you connected to the internet?

This app was created by Roman Tymchyk.

OMGUW Reader is an unofficial app for OMGUW, and as such is not affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by OMGUW (or University of Waterloo). Its function is for entertainment purposes only. I am not responsible for any content displayed. Use at your own risk.

Many thanks to the people at OMGUW for maintaining the site.
If you have any questions about OMGUW Reader, please do not hesistate to contact me via e-mail (rtymchyk@gmail.com)
Uh Oh! There was a problem fetching the data. Check your internet connection and try again later.
